strapiPost.title: J.B. Hunt Enters Top 300 of Fortune 500
strapiPost.content:
J.B. Hunt has been named to the Fortune 500 for the eleventh consecutive year, landing the 280th spot — the company's first time to break into the top 300.

  • On the list: Fortune has published its annual Fortune 500 list since 1955, ranking the largest companies in the U.S. by total revenue for the respective fiscal year. J.B. Hunt's first appearance was in 2013 at 485. 
  • The trophy shelf: This recognition adds to J.B. Hunt's recent accolades — the company was also listed on Fortune's list of World's Most Admired Companies earlier this year, and Newsweek recognized J.B. Hunt as one of America's Greatest Workplaces for Women and Greatest Workplaces for Diversity.
